SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
VISUALFORCE B2B COMMERCE RELEASE NOTES AND UPGRADE GUIDE
Deliver Better Semantic Tagging on the Product List Page

Boost the search ranking of your Product List page showing category results in external search results. The Product List page now contains the correct semantic hierarchy of heading tags. This change helps increase the authority of the page and allows search engine bots to more accurately crawl the content on the bot-enabled Product List page.

Where: This change applies to B2B Commerce for Visualforce Summer ’19 (version 4.11) in Lightning Experience and Salesforce Classic in Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer editions.

How: When you upgrade the managed package and enable bot detection, this change is available automatically on the bot-enabled Product List page.

NOTE Only version 2.0 of the Product List page supports the bot-enabled page.

If you're not using bot-enabled pages, the tags are available in both version 2.0 and 1.0 of the Product List page served to human users.

SEE ALSO
Serve Bot-Enabled Versions of Storefront Pages

title: Improving Search Ranking for Product Lists
